tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_schedule (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  work_shift VARCHAR(20),
  work_day DATE,
  work_assignment VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE WorkAssignment (
	assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	employee_id INT, 
	workstation_id INT, 
	assignment_date DATE, 
	assignment_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee (
    employee_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE shift (
    shift_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    department_id INT,
    supervisor_id INT
);
